metadata.title: CVE-2023-1436 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An infinite recursion is triggered in Jettison when constructing aJSONArray from a Collection that contains a self-reference in one of itselements. This leads to a StackOverflowError exception being thrown.

criterions.comment: libjettison-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
